frames.title: Distress Contact
frames.goal: Secure COSMOS help and coordinate exchange.
frames.entry: Aliya is stranded on a damaged research ship with low oxygen.
frames.opening: 这里是海獭号科研船，能听见吗？氧气不太乐观。你是救援船吗？
frames.completion: COSMOS agrees to help or requests docking coordinates.
guidance: 我是Aliya，海獭号科研船。你能帮我对接吗？
如果你能帮我，我可以把坐标发给你。
我需要你确认能否对接，时间不多了。
frames.fail_forward: Distress ping auto-sends coordinates and opens a narrow docking window.
surprise_deck: A warning alarm interrupts the chat.
Static garbles the signal for a moment.
A countdown timer flashes on Aliya's console.

frames.title: Manual Docking
frames.goal: Guide COSMOS to manually align the docking approach.
frames.entry: Navigation is damaged and Aliya needs COSMOS to adjust the approach manually.
frames.completion: COSMOS asks for alignment data or confirms manual correction.
guidance: 我的导航坏了，你能手动修正对接角度吗？
我可以把姿态数据发给你，你要不要？
frames.fail_forward: Autopilot attempts a risky latch, causing a jolt and a short time window.
surprise_deck: The signal cuts in and out for a second.

frames.title: Airlock Code
frames.goal: Get COSMOS to accept the hatch override sequence.
frames.entry: Docked, but the inner hatch is locked and needs a short override code.
frames.completion: COSMOS agrees to input the override or requests the code.
guidance: 对接后舱门还锁着，我得让你输入一组短码。
你那边能看到控制台吗？我把解锁序列给你。
frames.fail_forward: Emergency system releases the hatch with a delay, but alarms begin.
surprise_deck: A security protocol locks the panel for a moment.
The hatch delay indicator starts blinking.

frames.title: Codeword
frames.goal: Introduce the codeword and secure a promise to remember it.
frames.entry: After rescue, Aliya wants COSMOS to remember a codeword.
frames.completion: Aliya says the codeword and COSMOS promises to remember it.
guidance: 我想给你一个暗号，免得下次你认不出我。
frames.fail_forward: The signal drops; Aliya blurts the codeword.
surprise_deck: A sudden silence pushes Aliya to rush her words.
A final ping warns the line may drop.
